entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: SW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
